examples.example: 老师总是合理地要求我们认真学习，这让我们不断进步。

translate.english: The teacher always reasonably asks us to study hard, which makes us make continuous progress.

examples.example: 父母总是以温和的方式要求我养成良好的习惯，让我受益无穷。

translate.english: Parents always ask me to develop good habits in a gentle way, which benefits me a lot.

examples.example: 妈妈总是合理地要求我按时吃饭睡觉，让我拥有健康的身体。

translate.english: Mother always reasonably asks me to eat and sleep on time, so that I have a healthy body.
